How many people are affected by cerebral cavernous malformation ?,Cerebral cavernous malformations affect about 0.5 percent of the population worldwide.,GHR,cerebral cavernous malformation
What are the genetic changes related to cerebral cavernous malformation ?,"Mutations in at least three genes, KRIT1 (also known as CCM1), CCM2, and PDCD10 (also known as CCM3), cause familial cerebral c
